title: Strengthening Patient-Centered Communication Competencies through Medical Case-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of Basic Medical Terminology and Fundamental Principles of Patient Interaction
context.additional_context: Process enhancing adaptability to medical settings by analyzing diverse patient cases in a smartphone-based LMS environment, with immediate feedback via formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can explain patient-centered approaches by analyzing five or more medical cases reflecting patient diversity (age, cultural background, disease type)
Learners propose three or more effective communication strategies between medical staff and patients in case-specific discussion forums and undergo peer evaluation
Learners recognize the necessity of multidisciplinary teamwork (MDT) based on virtual patient scenarios and develop role-sharing plans

resources: Diverse Background Virtual Patient Case Database (Text + Audio)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
